Boxee is based upon the inspiring work of the following individuals and groups who made XBMC Media Center possible.

[B]Project Founders[/B][CR]Frodo, RUNTiME, d7o3g4q (a.k.a. Duo Egaq)[CR][B]Project Managers[/B][CR]Pike, Gamester17[CR][B]Developers[/B][CR]Jmarshall, Darkie, elupus, Bobbin007, GeminiServer, nad, MrC, c0diq, Chadoe, Ysbox, Kreet, Yuvalt, Vulkanr, D4rk, elan, LiquidIce629, Kraqh3d, Forza, Tslayer, Butcher, Guybrush, monkeyhapp, Spiff, Topfs2, WiSo, agathorn, davilla, DonJ, l.capriotti, malloc, monkeyman, Alcoheca, Rudd, VDRfan, wattazoum, c0diq, puh-puh, [XC]D-Ice[CR][B]Skinners / Graphic-artists[/B][CR]Jezz_X, SmokeHead, CHI3f, ChokeManiac[CR][B]Web Services[/B][CR]Granqvist, blittan [CR][B]Testers[/B][CR]DDay, TeknoJuce, Modhack, Donno, C-Quel, sCAPe, Nuka1195[CR][B]Visualisations[/B][CR]Dinomight, MrC, mynci, nmrs, questor[CR][B]Support[/B][CR]AlTheKiller, Bizzeh, Cocoliso, DOS4GW, Jedi79, MattAAron, No1CaNTeL, xLoial, DDay

[B]Wiki[/B][CR]Sho, Dankula, Loto_Bak, nimbles, No Good[CR][B]Great Patch Submitters[/B][CR]Lossol93, markeen, soepy, stgcolin, WiSO[CR][B]Code Credits[/B][CR]Adplug, ALSA, CxImage, FFmpeg, FileZilla (FTP-Server), FreeType (freetype.org), FriBiDi, GensAPU, GoAhead (Web-Server), liba52, libbluray, libCDIO, libcurl, libdaap, libdca/libdts (VideoLan.org), libdvdcss, libdvdnav/dvdread, libfaad2 (AudioCoding.com), libid3tag, libLame, libmad, libmms, libmpcdec, libmpeg2, libOggVorbis, libSpeex, libvorbis, LZO, Matroska, MikMod, MXM, NoseFart, Platinum (UPnP-client), Python, Samba/libsmb (SMB/CIFS-client), SDL, Sidplay2, SNESAPU, SQLite, St-Sound Library, UnRAR (rarlab.com), xiph, XviD[CR][B]Team-Boxee & Friends[/B][CR]Alley, Alon, Amibd, Amit, Andrew, Arvid, Asaf, Asher, Avneron, Blake, Bondar, Casey, Dan, Dconti, Dikla, Don Xavier, Eli, Emily, Erez, Esch, Fabian, Gervis, Gkamin, Gadgetguy, Gidonc, Guy, Idan, Ishai, Jamie, Joe, Kadosh, kbryman, Kevin, Liel, Liz, Matej, Marcel, Melissa, Merav, MistralZ, Nick, Nimrod, nMiller, Noa, Oferlaor, Omer, Ori, Price, Rafim, Ray, Riegersn, Rob, Russel, Ryan, Salek, Sarah, Scott, Shamil, Shay, Shayy, Tatum, thesubjective, TomD, Tsella, Vulkanr, Wil, Will R, yoavm, Yonathan, Yes, Yuvalt, Zach, Zvisha

In just a minute you’ll be able to play thousands of Movies, Shows and Clips from the Internet and your home network.[CR][CR]Press the [UPPERCASE][COLOR boxeegreenheidi][B]center[/UPPERCASE][/COLOR][/B] button on your remote to get started.
Do you see this displayed correctly ?
Boxee looks best when your screen is properly sized. It's simple:
Use your remote to align arrow #1 to the top left corner of the screen.
Press Select on your remote when it's good.
Repeat with Arrow #2 on the bottom right.

Get started with Boxee by creating a new account or login with your existing Boxee account.
Connect to Boxee via Facebook to quickly create a new account and have video recommendations from your friends automatically sent to your TV. Otherwise, fill out the sign up fields and hit next.
You’re almost there. This stuff helps us understand you better. That said, we keep it secure and don’t share it.
To finish setting up your Boxee account, accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Get video recommendations from your friends sent straight to your TV, never miss out on the latest viral video, and share your favorites!
All fields must be filled to continue.
Sorry,you must be at least 13 years old to create a Boxee account.We'll be waiting for you!

Tell Boxee what you’re going to be watching most, and we’ll customize your experience by displaying those videos in the TV Show and Movie libraries.[CR][CR]Note: You can always change this preference later in the Settings menu.
Your Watch Later list is empty.
New episodes of TV shows you mark favorite will appear here, or you can add any video manually by clicking its Watch Later icon.
You can also add videos from the web. Visit [COLOR yellow]http://www.boxee.tv/watchlater[/COLOR] for instructions.
You can watch videos shared by your friends on Facebook and Twitter. [CR]Activate this feature by connecting your Facebook and Twitter accounts to Boxee.
Click the Favorite icon before you launch an app to add it to your favorites.
Items you play will appear in this list so that they're easy to find when you want to play them again later.
To view your photos on Boxee, add a folder from a hard drive or network source.
Click the Favorite icon on the episodes screen of any show you love to add it to your favorites.
To listen to your music on Boxee, add a folder from a hard drive or network source.
Boxee can't find any videos in this category that can be played in your area.
To access local files on Boxee, add a folder from a hard drive or network source.
To play local media on Boxee, add a folder from a hard drive or network source.

Repositories are libraries of apps available from third-parties. You can find them by searching on the Internet.
No local media source defined yet.
To play local media on Boxee, add a folder from a hard drive or network source.
Once you're ready to add one, click the button below to add its URL.

Make a playlist of movies, shows and web videos to watch later.[CR][CR]Save videos from YouTube, Vimeo and tons of other sites using the Boxee Bookmarklet.[CR][CR]Favorite a show using the star button to have any new episodes automatically added to your Queue.
We've just sent an email to [COLOR green]%s[/COLOR] with instructions on how to get started.
To browse local sources on Boxee, add a folder from a hard drive or network source.

New episodes of TV shows you mark favorite will appear here, or you can add any video manually by clicking its Watch Later icon.[CR]You can also add videos from the web. Visit [COLOR yellow]http://www.boxee.tv/watchlater[/COLOR] for instructions.

Access videos, songs, or pictures from your computers or network drives.[CR][CR]To add a source, browse your files and navigate to a directory with your media. Then select the [COLOR boxeegreenheidi]+ button[/COLOR] from the top right of the screen.

In a few minutes, you’ll be enjoying your favorite broadcast TV stations through Boxee’s unique social interface.[CR][CR]Please connect an antenna or cable outlet to the Live TV dongle then select [COLOR boxeegreenheidi]Next[/COLOR].
Please connect an antenna or TV cable to the Live TV dongle.
In order to find the right program guide for your area, we need to determine your location.
Boxee will now fetch channel listings for the location you specified.[CR][CR]Tell Boxee where your TV signals are coming from, so we can get the correct channel listings.
Invalid zip code please try again
Select shows you love to have new episodes[CR]delivered automatically to you when they’re available.
Boxee has introduced a new way to share what you watch with friends & family on your Facebook Timeline.[CR][CR]You can turn it off at any time in Settings > Live TV.
Facebook has recently changed their permissions that will enhance your Boxee experience.[CR][CR]In order to share what you watch to your Facebook timeline.we need to update Boxee's permissions.
Cool - we’ve saved all your faves.[CR][CR]Boxee will now add new online episodes of your favorites to your TV queue and send you a weekly email with what’s playing on Live TV this week.

Share what you watch with friends & family on your Facebook Timeline.[CR][CR]All you need to do is give Boxee permission to publish watch events.[CR][CR]You can turn it off at any time in Settings > Live TV.

Select the limit for TV shows to restrict them from being seen in On-demand, local, and web libraries.[CR]If you have Boxee Live TV, shows will appear in the listings, but will require a passcode to view.[CR]Unidentified local files cannot be fitlered.

Select the limit for Movies to restrict them from being seen in On-demand, local, and web libraries.[CR]If you have Boxee Live TV, movies will appear in the listings, but will require a passcode to view.[CR]Unidentified local files cannot be fitlered.
You'll need to enter this passcode to view content set above your rating limit, as well as make changes to parental controls.

Try moving your antenna to different location. Make sure it is properly connected.[CR][CR]You can also connect the coaxial cable that comes into your house from your internet/cable provider to get free QAM channels.

Make sure your antenna or cable cord is connected to the USB tuner.[CR][CR]Edits you have made to your current channel lineup will be lost.
